## Finding derivatives using R

### *f(x) = x\^2 at x= 3*

```{r}
#expression
fx <- expression(x^2)

#derivative with respect to x
df <- D(expr = fx, name = "x")
df

#evaluate slope at x = 3
x <- 3
eval(df)
```

### *P(a) = 2(3a +2)\^4  - 5 at a = 1.2*

```{r}
#create exoression
dp <- expression(2 * (3 * a + 2)^4 - 5)

#derivative with respect to a 
dp_da <- D(expr = dp, name = "a")
dp_da

#evaluate slope at a = 1.2
a <- 1.2
eval(dp_da)
```
